trans-unit.source: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).
trans-unit.target: 針對做為 XHTML 配接器集目標的裝置提供文字寫入器功能，包括可延伸超文字標記語言 (XHTML)、XHTML Mobile 和無線標記語言 (WML)。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: XHTML is an XML-compliant markup that is based on HTML 4.1 and allows you to create Web sites suitable for multiple device types.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 是 XML 相容的標記根據 HTML 4.1，並可讓您建立適用於多個裝置類型的網站。

trans-unit.source: It merges HTML's ease of use with XML's strict element guidelines to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options and reduced markup tag ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: 它會合併 HTML 的方便使用 XML 的嚴格的項目指導方針，以產生與各種不同的格式和樣式選項的標記語言，並降低標記標記模稜兩可。

trans-unit.source: This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供給用戶端轉譯 XHTML 內容時，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用的格式化功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> renders markup that meets the standards of three different XHTML doc types: XHTML Basic, which supports limited style and format elements; XHTML Mobile Profile, which supports inline style sheets; and WML 2.0, which is based on XHTML 1.1 and supports cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>符合三個不同的 XHTML 文件類型的標準呈現標記： XHTML 基本，可支援有限的樣式和格式項目。XHTML 行動裝置設定檔，它支援內嵌樣式表。和 WML 2.0 中，這取決於 XHTML 1.1，而且支援階層式樣式表。

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別主要是由自訂行動頁面和控制項配接器的開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> class can render all HTML elements, attributes, and style attributes, but, unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class, does not allow title capitalization of these markup elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>類別呈現所有 HTML 元素、 屬性和樣式屬性，但，不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>類別中，不允許這些標記項目的標題大小寫。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter> instantiates an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> and depending on the capabilities of the target device, initializes a number of properties, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>, that assist the text writer in rendering the page and its controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlPageAdapter>具現化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>並根據目標裝置的功能，初始化數個屬性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SupportsNoWrapStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.UseDivsForBreaks%2A>，協助的文字寫入器中呈現網頁並將其控制項。

trans-unit.source: Your adapter can use a variety of methods to apply styles and control formatting:
trans-unit.target: 您的配接器可以使用各種方法來套用樣式和控制格式：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitStyle%2A>,
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterStyle%2A> 和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitStyle%2A>，

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>, and
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A> 和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>，和

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitFormat%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterFormat%2A> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitFormat%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter> class, which in turn derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MultiPartWriter> class, and much of its functionality is provided by these base classes.
trans-unit.target: 此類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter>類別，又衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MultiPartWriter>類別和其功能的大部分由這些基底類別。

trans-unit.source: You can use the members of this class, and any members it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter> class, to create custom text writers to use in a custom XHTML page or in class adapters.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別的成員與它所繼承的任何成員<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter>類別，以建立自訂文字撰寫者使用類別介面卡或自訂的 XHTML 頁面中。

trans-unit.source: You can also create new derived classes that override the standard behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立新的衍生的類別覆寫的標準行為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>類別。

trans-unit.source: Device filtering is required in order to use a specific adapter or text writer for a server control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的伺服器控制項的特定介面卡或文字寫入器需要裝置篩選。

trans-unit.source: For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).
trans-unit.target: 如需裝置篩選的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)和[裝置篩選概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: The base writer object, usually an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 基底寫入器物件，通常是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object of <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> class that provides the capability information for the target device.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> 類別的物件，提供目標裝置的功能資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlMobileTextWriter" /> class for the provided device, using the <paramref name="writer" /> parameter as the base writer object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <paramref name="writer" /> 參數做為基底寫入器物件，針對提供的裝置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Certain WML devices require a `<wml:onevent>` element to provide information for postback.
trans-unit.target: 某些 WML 裝置需要`<wml:onevent>`項目可提供回傳的資訊。

trans-unit.source: WML devices provide limited functionality for navigation and postback, and require WML commands and variables to be written to the page.
trans-unit.target: WML 裝置用於導覽及回傳時，提供有限的功能，並需要 WML 命令和變數寫入頁面。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object to save all rendered markup until written out in its entirety by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EndCachedRendering" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 物件儲存所有呈現的標記，直到由 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.EndCachedRendering" /> 方法完全寫出為止。

trans-unit.target: 取得唯一的索引鍵，用於擷取來自 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Cache" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> containing a unique key.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" />，包含唯一的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 有些裝置在項目，不允許內嵌樣式，但需要提供連結的樣式表的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the linked style sheet is stored in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>, the URL contains a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.CacheKey%2A> that identifies the style sheet to return.
trans-unit.target: 如果連結的樣式表儲存在<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>，此 URL 包含唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.CacheKey%2A>可識別要傳回的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: For these target devices, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的目標裝置，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>移樣式呈現控制項的樣式表快取的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A page adapter can instruct the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> to save the style sheet in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A>, or in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A> before rendering the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面配置器可以指示<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>儲存中的樣式表<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A>，或在<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A>之前頁面的呈現。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey(System.Web.Caching.Cache)" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 尚未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey(System.Web.Caching.Cache)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key used to retrieve items from the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Session" />.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" />，包含索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 有些裝置在項目，不允許內嵌樣式，但需要提供連結的樣式表的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the linked style sheet is stored in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>, the URL contains a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SessionKey%2A> that identifies the style sheet to return.
trans-unit.target: 如果連結的樣式表儲存在<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>，此 URL 包含唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SessionKey%2A>可識別要傳回的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: For these target devices, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的目標裝置，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>移樣式呈現控制項的樣式表中的快取的資訊<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A page adapter can instruct the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter> to save the style sheet in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A>, or in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> using <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A> before rendering the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面配置器可以指示<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter>儲存中的樣式表<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey%2A>，或在<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey%2A>之前頁面的呈現。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性主要由自訂行動頁面和控制項配接器的開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey(System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState)" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 尚未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey(System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the provided style as the style for the <see langword="<body>" /> element of the page and as the default style for its child controls.

trans-unit.source: Writes a line terminator string to the output stream if the current element is not a block element such as <see langword="<p>" />, <see langword="<div>" />, <see langword="<ul>" />, <see langword="<table>" />, and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine" /> is <see langword="false" />, and there is a pending break.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的項目不是區塊項目 (例如 <see langword="<p>" />、<see langword="<div>" />、<see langword="<ul>" />、<see langword="<table>" />) 且 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SuppressNewLine" /> 為 <see langword="false" />，並有暫止中斷，則會將行結束字元字串寫入至輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Both the name of the parameter and the URL value are encoded, and an equal sign (=) is inserted between them.
trans-unit.target: 參數和 URL 值的名稱會編碼、 和等號 （=） 括號之間插入。

trans-unit.source: Spaces in the `name` or `value` strings are encoded as plus signs (+), and equal signs (=) are encoded as %3d.
trans-unit.target: 中的空間`name`或`value`字串會編碼為加號 （+）、 和等號 （=） 會編碼為 %3d。
